messages.title: YOUR CHOICE THIS ELECTION
messages.content: The risk of a Corbyn Government if we do not win.

messages.title: STRONGER LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: Theresa May offers a strong leadership for negotiations over Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continued economic growth, controlling public spending and keeping taxes down.
Getting the best Brexit deal for Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting the best Brexit deal for Britain.
issues.economy: Continued economic growth, controlling public spending and keeping taxes down.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jacob is a family man who lives locally in West Harptree with his wife Helena and their six children.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for North East Somerset
politicalExperience.achievements: Voted over 600 times for strong government measures and against a coalition of chaos.

images.caption: Jacob Rees-Mogg standing with Theresa May

leaflet.additionalNotes: There are several personal testimonials from constituents supporting Jacob Rees-Mogg, emphasizing his helpfulness and responsiveness.
